Text:
Go to xenu dot net.  
google this shit and research this CULT before you buy into this bullshit.  Research L Ron Hubbard.  Don't go to their website, either.  Go to a reputable source.
It's an abusive, aggressive, deceitful, exploitive CULT!  Don't be another Rondroid.
Steal this album and never listen to it, just as an extra slap in the face to these lunatics.
Sell it bootleg if you can, and burn at least one copy to throw at a pushy scientologist.
Jesus motherfucking Christ, this shit is even worse than christian rock....
If you are gonna choose a cult, I recommend "My Life with the Thrill Kill Kult". They make better music.
